interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Six Million Dollar Man: Season 1
Review Date: 2019/11/12
Store: Lee Majors  (Actor),     Richard Anderson  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Grievously injured in the crash of an experimental aircraft, Colonel Steve Austin\'s shattered body is covertly rebuilt via the miracle of modern science known as bionics. Equipped with atomic-powered limbs that make him "better, stronger, faster" than the average mortal, Austin (Lee Majors) can now run at speeds exceeding 60 miles per hour, overturn cars with ease, and spot an encroaching enemy from over a mile away. Under the watchful eye of OSI director Oscar Goldman (Richard Anderson), Steve repays his debt to the taxpayers by taking on perilous missions of a highly classified nature. Season 1 chronicles Steve Austin\'s amazing metamorphosis from "a man barely alive" to cyborg to patriotic superspy. Armed with futuristic abilities, Austin is dispatched to do battle with kidnappers, arms smugglers, evil scientists, political assassins, and a diabolical robot—with time enough to spare to counsel a troubled astronaut (William Shatner) and clear his dead father\'s name. Relive the thrill of Steve\'s first bionic run in this digitally remastered 6-DVD set featuring 13 uncut episodes; all three made-for-TV movies in their original, unedited versions; and over two hours of never-before-seen bonus materials!', 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 6:', 'Real Bionics', 'Real Bionics', 'An Iconic Opening', 'An Iconic Opening', 'Season 1 VIPs: A celebration of The Six Million Dollar Man Guest Stars', 'Season 1 VIPs: A celebration of The Six Million Dollar Man Guest Stars', 'OSI Mission Debriefing: Executive Producer Harve Bennett', 'OSI Mission Debriefing: Executive Producer Harve Bennett', 'Interactive Bonus Feature: Bionic Breakdown', 'Interactive Bonus Feature: Bionic Breakdown', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Lee Majors, Richard Anderson', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.35 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '14 hours and 44 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 29, 2011', 'Actors': 'Lee Majors, Richard Anderson', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '6'}

Doris Day: The Essential Collection
Rock Hudson  (Actor),     Doris Day  (Actor),     Norman Jewison  (Director),     Michael Gordon  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Classics
['Charismatic and beautiful, Doris Day is America\'s original sweetheart who delighted audiences with her comedic timing, silky-smooth voice and sunny personality during the 1950s and 1960s. A box-office sensation for many years, her hugely successful acting career is celebrated in Doris Day: The Essential Collection which includes a selection of her most popular screen appearances: Pillow Talk, Lover Come Back, Send Me No Flowers, The Thrill Of It All!, Midnight Lace and The Man Who Knew Too Much. Co-starring Hollywood legends including Rock Hudson, James Stewart, Tony Randall, Rex Harrison and James Garner, this timeless collection is a stunning tribute to the "girl next door" who continues to capture hearts on and off the screen.Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - Pillow Talk:', 'Back in Bed with Pillow Talk', 'Back in Bed with Pillow Talk', 'Chemistry 101: The Film Duo of Doris Day and Rock Hudson', 'Chemistry 101: The Film Duo of Doris Day and Rock Hudson', 'Feature Commentary with Film Historians Jeff Bond, Julie Kirgo and Nick Redman', 'Feature Commentary with Film Historians Jeff Bond, Julie Kirgo and Nick Redman', 'Trailer', 'Trailer', 'Disc 4 - The Man Who Knew Too Much:', 'The Making of The Man Who Knew Too Much', 'The Making of The Man Who Knew Too Much', 'Production Photographs', 'Production Photographs', 'Trailers', 'Trailers', 'Production Notes.', 'Production Notes.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user shows a strong commitment to LGBT-themed adult movies while significantly expanding their appreciation for classic and action-themed television series, indicating a broadening taste in media.
- **Media Format:** The user maintains a preference for DVDs for adult content and has embraced boxed sets of classic series, demonstrating a willingness to explore various genres in traditional formats.
- **Quality Expectations:** The user continues to have high standards for video quality, remaining critical of inadequacies as evidenced by past complaints about adult media. Their recent high ratings for classic series reflect an increasing emphasis on quality in all genres.
- **Rating Behavior:** Historically, the user has rated adult content poorly (1.0) when quality is lacking. However, they have recently rated a classic series highly (5.0), suggesting a refined appreciation for well-produced content outside of adult themes.
- **Engagement with Content:** The user actively engages with explicit media while also delving into classic action and adventure series, reflecting a more nuanced approach to media consumption that values both entertainment and production quality.

Overall, the user demonstrates a keen interest in adult media alongside a newfound appreciation for classic television series, maintaining a strong focus on high video quality across all content types.
